quotes.text: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.text: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
quotes.author: Harold Abelson

quotes.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.text: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.text: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: In order to understand recursion, one must first understand recursion.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things.
quotes.author: Phil Karlton

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Software is a great combination between artistry and engineering.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
quotes.author: Ralph Johnson

quotes.text: The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user.
quotes.author: C.A.R. Hoare

quotes.text: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.text: It's not a bug â€“ it's an undocumented feature.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuchs

quotes.text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: Good code is its own best documentation.
quotes.author: Steve McConnell

quotes.text: Code never lies, comments sometimes do.
quotes.author: Ron Jeffries

quotes.text: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.
quotes.author: Grady Booch

quotes.text: Software development is a team sport.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: A good programmer is someone who always looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
quotes.author: Doug Linder

quotes.text: The best code is no code at all.
quotes.author: Jeff Atwood

quotes.text: If you think your users are idiots, only idiots will use it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: You should hire Brian Kim, he is a very passionate developer
quotes.author: Brian Kim's Mom
